oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Education: Nine Best Internet Tools
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Paull, John
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
History of organics
Education, extension and communication
Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Internet offers unprecedented opportunities for a free organic farming and food education, allowing instant access to the most recent through to seminal works. Nine of the best tools for free organic education and training are described.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Paull, John (2007) Organic Education: Nine Best Internet Tools. Elementals: Journal of Bio-Dynamics Tasmania, 2007 (84), pp. 37-40.
